author: Pblico
title: Ground News - Raquel Martí (UNRWA Spain): “There is interest in discrediting UNRWA in Gaza because we are annoying witnesses”
text: Raquel Martí (UNRWA Spain): “There is interest in discrediting UNRWA in Gaza because we are annoying witnesses” Raquel Martí is the executive director in Spain of UNRWA (United Nations Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Middle East), which is in a critical situation following accusations by Israel, which link her to Summary by Público [Hamas](https://ground.news/interest/hamas), and several of its employees, to the attacks of October 7. 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Público Raquel Martí (UNRWA Spain): “There is interest in discrediting UNRWA in Gaza because we are annoying witnesses” Raquel Martí is the executive director in Spain of UNRWA (United Nations Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Middle East), which is in a critical situation following accusations by Israel, which link her to Hamas, and several of its employees, to the attacks of October 7. 2 hours agoRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Coverage Details Total News Sources0Leaning Left1Leaning Right0Center0Last Updated50 minutes agoBias Distribution 100% Left Bias Distribution - 100% of the sources lean Left 100% Left L 100% Factuality To view factuality data please Upgrade to Premium Ownership To view ownership data please Upgrade to Vantage Sources are mostly out of (0)
